thread.title: Benefit’s new Dandelion Twinkle highlighter will give you a soft pink glow for spring
thread.title_full: Benefit’s new Dandelion Twinkle highlighter will give you a soft pink glow for spring

author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
title: Benefit’s new Dandelion Twinkle highlighter will give you a soft pink glow for spring
text:
Benefit’s new Dandelion Twinkle highlighter will give you a soft pink glow for spring We can’t say enough good things about Benefit Cosmetics’ Dandelion collection — all the products are absolutely gorgeous, not to mention that the packaging is as sweet as can be ! As of today, they’ve released a pink highlighter blush from the collection and we are completely over the moon ! The Dandelion Twinkle will give you that soft pink glow that will lead you straight into springtime!
Last year, Benefit graced us with a liquid Dandelion highlighter, and now they’ve got a beautiful powder highlighter as well! You know how we feel about choices — the more, the better!
UPDATE: Will be Available @ultabeauty online and in stores April Available NOW! LINK ➡ BIO online @Sephora *for everyone The NEW Addition to the #Dandelion Family by @benefitcosmetics ✨#DandelionTwinkle ✨ Last Year they added a liquid blush and this year they are adding A #HIGHLIGHTER Has a beautiful Soft pink #glow ✨ Did u get yours? ✌ #TRENDMOOD #benefit #benefitcosmetics #cosmetics #pink #ilovemakeup #hudabeauty #slave2beauty #blush #motd #bbloggers #blogger #beautyblogger #beauty #beautiful #makeupjunkie #makeuptalk #sephora #ulta 
A post shared by TRENDMOOD (@trendmood1) on Feb 24, 2017 at 7:27am PST 
Isn’t it adorable?
The Dandelion Twinkle Powder Highlighter is available for $29. Benefit Cosmetics 
That peachy-pink glow is so precious! Can you imagine how radiant it’ll make us look?
Since it’s made of a superfine baked powder, it is super easy to apply and it makes for a quick and simple highlighting process. And if that’s not enough, it’s got that delicious and delicate signature blossom scent that all the products in the Dandelion Twinkle line have. Doesn’t get much better than that!
Are you going to add this puppy to your highlighter collection? It’s pretty irresistible, along with the rest of the Dandelion line!
We’re still drooling over the Dandelion Dew liquid blush ($28)! Benefit Cosmetics 
And how about that Dandelion Ultra Plush Lip Gloss ($16)? Benefit Cosmetics We need them all!
Head on over to Benefit and pick up the Dandelion Twinkle highlighter…and maybe a few other pieces from the collection as well! We won’t tell, it’ll be our secret. TGIF, right lovelies?
